readascii module

class readascii.ReadAscii(file_path: str, colnames: list = ['wave', 'flux'])

Bases: object

Class to read spectrum data from ASCII files with two columns (wavelength/frequency/wavenumber and flux).

file_path

Path to the ASCII file.

Type:

str

data

Data loaded from the file.

Type:

pd.DataFrame

get_data()

Return the loaded data.

load_data()

Load data from an ASCII file with two columns. The first column is assumed to be wavelength/frequency/wavenumber,
